# Instructions for GitHub Copilot

## General Guidelines

- Follow the plan in [PLAN.md](../PLAN.md) and the implementation details in [IMPLEMENTATION.md](../IMPLEMENTATION.md) closely.
- When a implementation step is ambiguous, ask for clarification before proceeding.
- When a implementation step is complete, verify it against the requirements in the PLAN.md and IMPLEMENTATION.md files.

## Style and Architecture

- Write clean, readable, and maintainable code.
- Follow best practices for the specific programming language being used.
- Use consistent naming conventions and code formatting.
- Modularize code into functions, classes, and modules as appropriate.
- Include comments and documentation to explain complex logic and decisions.
- Ensure proper error handling and logging.
- Follow the principle of hexagonal architecture (ports and adapters) for the backend service.
